channel.title: WhatsApp on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in WhatsApp on TechnoStreet

item.title: WhatsApp: How to use the image blurring tool on desktop
item.description: WhatsApp: How to use the image blurring tool on desktop WhatsApp recently rolled out the blur tool for some of its users.

item.title: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg As Meta doubles down on its monetisation drive across its family of apps, its Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that JioMart on WhatsApp in India will be a big opportunity for the paid messaging market.

item.title: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for us: Zuckerberg
item.description: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for us: Zuckerberg New Delhi: As Meta doubles down on its monetisation drive across its family of apps, its Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that JioMart on WhatsApp in India is going to be a big opportunity for the paid messaging market.
